document.full_text: 'my one and only,' at the goodspeed opera house, features songs by george and ira gershwin and choreography by kelli barclay.
document.title: arts | connecticut: broadway rhythm reappears in 'my one and only'
lines_and_colors: 'my one and only,' at the goodspeed opera house, features songs by george and ira gershwin and choreography by kelli barclay.
